code: import{useState}from"react";import{sendContact}from"../api";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Home(){const[name,setName]=useState("");const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[message,setMessage]=useState("");const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();await sendContact({name,email,message});alert("Message sent successfully");setName("");setEmail("");setMessage("");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"NovaWeb Studios"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Name",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{placeholder:"Message",value:message,onChange:e=>setMessage(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Send"})]})]});}
